answerText: Hard Times[10] Hard Times is by this Victorian novelist who wrote of the coming of age of Philip Pirrip in Great Expectations.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | LASA A + UVA B | 2 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Mrs. Pegler reveals that Josiah Bounderby is not a self-made man. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel set in Coketown, where Thomas Gradgrind runs a school that aims to teach children only facts and to discourage imagination.
